channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- One User Avatar | User Profile Picture
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- One User Avatar | User Profile Picture

item.title: CVE-2021-24675|2024-08-03T19:42:16.224Z -- unknown -- one%20user%20avatar%20%7C%20user%20profile%20picture
item.description: The One User Avatar WordPress plugin before 2.3.7 does not check for CSRF when updating the Avatar in page where the [avatar_upload] shortcode is embed. As a result, attackers could make logged in user change their avatar via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2021-24672|2024-08-03T19:42:15.980Z -- unknown -- one%20user%20avatar%20%7C%20user%20profile%20picture
item.description: The One User Avatar WordPress plugin before 2.3.7 does not escape the link and target attributes of its shortcode, allowing users with a role as low as Contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
